evidence_example.title: test5
evidence_example.small_descr: A minimal EE demo that demostrates how the nesting of the interrupts works.
evidence_example.long_descr:
A minimal EE demo that demostrates how the nesting of the interrupts works. This demo can be used to test nesting mechanism. The compilation uses the conf.oil file to create Debug folder. Debug folder contains:
  • the makefile;
  • the obj folder that contains the object files organized in a EE-like tree;
  • the executable file (.elf);
  • other files useful for debug;
